overlay.description: When enabled, it stops the audio being played in the overlay queue.

stop.description: Use `current` to stop the current audio being played. Use `all` to stop the current audio file being played and clear all audio files from the queue.

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.

command_id.description: Use this field to avoid duplicate commands. Telnyx will ignore any command with the same `command_id` for the same `call_control_id`.
